Minutes of economic talks between DPRK and Netherlands signed 
    Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Minutes of talks on bilateral cooperation in the fields of foreign trade and economy were signed between the Ministry of Foreign Trade of the DPRK and the Ministry of Economic Affairs of Netherlands in Pyongyang today.
 They were signed by Kim Ryong Mun, vice-minister of foreign trade, and Dominique Bauduin, chairman of the committee for international trade and investment of the Ministry of Economic Affairs of Netherlands.
